actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to shorten the waiting period for social security disability benefits for individuals with mesothelioma.
short_title: Prompt Disability Payment to Mesothelioma Victims Act of 2005
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Prompt Disability Payment to Mesothelioma Victims Act of 2005 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to shorten the waiting period for Social Security disability benefits for individuals with mesothelioma.

titles.title: Prompt Disability Payment to Mesothelioma Victims Act of 2005
A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to shorten the waiting period for social security disability benefits for individuals with mesothelioma.
